>From: GraniteSol@...

do you have to?? certainly not....Are your levels not loading, or loading
incorrectly....this is a stupid question, but, you are naming both grid and
scenario scen99 (I know the Official Levels are saved as scen99.fss and scen
009.pix or some such...but all my levels work when both are scen99) when I
say scen99 I dont really mean it...any number could work as well...just
using an example.....do you have player start positions for team zero? if
you want...mail me your level and I'll look at it and see if it works on my
comp. (this goes for anyone with levels they wanna check) ...Im
maxim@...  
     I don't mean to usurp Forgotten Sages place or anything, but Ive gotten
all my levels to work and have some experience programming and level editing
and such...
-max
